fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Tag a player's house during the night and/or remove a tag from a player's house during the day.
- Learn the names of everyone who visited a (currently) tagged player (during/after their tagging). 1 Use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All players who cannot win with a "good" faction using their current role will be notified when a player is tagged, or when their tag is removed.
- You gain an extra use of your second ability every time a kill-capable role incapable of winning with a "good" faction dies.
